experience.description: Senior Software Engineer / DevOps  — Acted as a cloud architect (AWS) for the Surycat solution giving health professionals a Saas solution to manage notifications during crisis. Contributed to the creation of an API using severless technologies.
Software Developer — Worked on the backend part (backoffice & API) using Rails. Created a tool allowing the dump of production database and their restore in a development environment.
Software Engineer — Helped streamlining development environment with Docker. Rewrote an event tracking API using Python 3 & Flask.
Software Developer — Worked on Surycat, a notification service that gets health professionals on track as soon as the siutation requires it.
Quality Analyst — Specialized in testing automation. Created a framework (based on Python & Selenium) to allow the QA team to write functional (front-end & API) tests faster.
(Intern) Software developer — Developped backoffice applications using Delphi & PostgreSQL
